products.title: Unishade Blackout Fr Beige 89mm Vertical Blind

products.title: Caspian Beige Vertical Blind
products.description: Caspian is a woven jaquard fabric available in three colours. It's subtle pattern is well suited to many tastes and room styles. Caspian beige vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Amor Oyster Mushroom Vertical Blind
products.description: The amor oyster mushroom is the colour beige is trying to be. Rich yet modest, neutral toned but commanding respect, this blind has so much confidence that you could put it in any room of the house and it will be your favourite thing in each one. It will sit comfortably in any company of any colour, ideally in living spaces and or bedrooms for when you need to block all of the light from entering your room.

products.title: Amor Beige Vertical Blind
products.description: The amor beige colour is perfect for matching in with magnolia walls and rooms of a neutral tone. The blackout and moisture resistant qualities of these blinds only adds to their appeal. These are their most popular blackout blinds and it's easy to see why - use this blind in your bedroom to block out the early summer sun. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Putty - Vertical Blind
products.description: The perfect cream shade, the sarra (blackout) in putty offers neutral elegance and can be blended with all kinds of colours. Its gently raised patterning adds texture and depth, preventing this blackout blind from being just another block-colour blind. For a neutral and unobtrusive colour scheme in the home office, that won't distract you from your work, mix the putty with mocha browns and cappuccino beiges - providing the perfect mood for that afternoon break's coffee.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Beige - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a modest look with soothing shade, choose the roma (fr) in beige, which hosts a calming oatmeal hue on a crisp and contemporary cloth. The modern style and adjustable slats of the blind allow you to create a chic display that lets you control the amount of light and air entering the room. Match the beige with harmonising walls in a sumptuous biscuit shade, adding a deeper taupe to accent the tone of the blind and for an assortment of similar hues.
